main event: An unidentified object was reported in the sky over Anchorage, Alaska on 16 October 1951.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 3-4 minutes and was thought to be an aircraft,It traveled at great speed and climbed straight up before disappearing,One witness described the object as a small bright light that appeared to be stationary for a period,The object's color was noted as bluish-white and it did not leave any trail,Initial speculation led to a conclusion that it was possibly an aircraft or balloon, but the lack of similar reports raised uncertainty about its nature.
witness description: Military personnel, including Lt. Col. Richardson and Pfc Mason
